resources.string: PMP Quick Refresher helps in revising the PMP concepts, formulae, definitions, tips and tricks to memorize and revise quickly. This will not only help PMP Certification aspirants in quick revision but also to revise the concepts post certification.

PMP Exam expects a good and solid understanding of project management concepts. Most of the Project Managers have been found following local practices which does not meet the standart practices. Due to which when they appear in PMP Exam, they wonder how their answers does not match with the standards and they fail to qualify. To overcome this issue, I have made a comprehensive and easy to understand course, for passing the PMP Certification exam. A Complete PMP Certification Preparation course, which covers detailed concepts, topic analysis, video tutorials, detailed explanations of each topic, tips and tricks, how to plan for PMP, recent changes in PMBOK, how to study, strategy to succeed and become PMP Certified in first attempt etc. If you are looking for clearing your concepts, various estimation techniques, formulae, exercises then do join my PMP Certification Preparation course. This course is available on Udemy. Also there is an app which will help you buying the individual topics of your choice instead of buying the entire course.
